content.description: Slabby granite characteristic of this area, the crux seems to be areas where there are no real hands or feet just below that second bolt. Follow the streak right up the middle past a couple of large dark knobs.
content.protection: 2 bolts, a Piton + one medium cam for first horizontal. Two bolt anchor at top. Rappel or walk-off(not recomended)
content.location: See PHX rock II. Just right and downhill of "Mish Mash"

content.description: Therei is a lot of granite here it is just whether it is good quality rock or not, phoenix rock 2 gives you all of the route descriptions and how to get there.  This place does not get much traffic.The best time to come here is the fall trhough spring although it may be cold in the shade somethimes
